columns.Program_ID: The unique identifier for the program.
columns.Name: The title of the program.
columns.Origin: The geographical location where the program was created.
columns.Launch: The year the program was first launched.
columns.Owner: The organization that owns the program.

program.table_description: The table tracks programs with their identifiers, names, origins, launch years, and owners.

columns.Channel_ID: The unique identifier for each channel.
columns.Name: The official name of the channel.
columns.Owner: The organization that owns the channel.
columns.Share_in_percent: The market share percentage of the channel.
columns.Rating_in_percent: The audience rating percentage of the channel.

channel.table_description: The table stores channels with their IDs, names, owners, share, and ratings.

columns.Channel_ID: The unique identifier for the channel broadcasting the program.
columns.Program_ID: The unique identifier for the program being broadcast.
columns.Time_of_day: The time during the day when the program is broadcast.

broadcast.table_description: The table connects channels and programs with their broadcasting times.

columns.Channel_ID: The unique identifier for the channel sharing the program.
columns.Program_ID: The unique identifier for the program being shared.
columns.Date: The date when the share percentage is recorded.
columns.Share_in_percent: The percentage of the program's share on the channel.

broadcast_share.table_description: The table records share percentages of programs on different channels per date.
